mapper.select: SELECT o.OCODE ,o.ONUM ,p.PIMG ,sm.SNAME ,p.PNAME ,o.P_DETAIL ,o.AMOUNT ,o.TOTAL ,o.UPDATEDATE,o2.STATE FROM ORDER_DETAIL o,PRODUCT p,MEM m,STORE_MEM sm,ORDERLIST o2 WHERE o.OCODE = o2.OCODE AND p.PCODE = o.PCODE AND p.SCODE = sm.SCODE AND m.MCODE = #{mcode} ORDER BY o.OCODE, o.ONUM ASC
